update.description:
This cmake module should only find ogre versions greater than or equal to 2

I also updated FindOGRE.cmake to only look for versions less than 2

Currently supports only linux.

‌
update.title: Add FindOGRE2.cmake

content.raw:
Because it came up as part of discussion of this issue, here is a small patch to get OGRE v2.1 to build in a colcon workspace: 

[https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/d96c82bcabb0aadd676f49f80dc4e2dc](https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/d96c82bcabb0aadd676f49f80dc4e2dc)
content.html:
Because it came up as part of discussion of this issue, here is a small patch to get OGRE v2.1 to build in a colcon workspace:

https://gist.github.com/mjcarroll/d96c82bcabb0aadd676f49f80dc4e2dc

content.raw: ya good catch. I wonder why I didn’t get the error. Fixed [55cb638](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/commits/55cb6383e6760d20d2bac5942d26527819648727)
content.html: ya good catch. I wonder why I didn’t get the error. Fixed 55cb638

content.raw: I think that this may be a copy-paste error from FindOGRE, because $\{full\_version\} is never set in this file.

content.raw: no they are not working for me on xenial too.  I know they are writing a new terrain system in another branch but don’t know what the status of that is. I think we may not get these features any time soon.
content.html: no they are not working for me on xenial too. I know they are writing a new terrain system in another branch but don’t know what the status of that is. I think we may not get these features any time soon.

content.raw: I've gotten `v2-1` building on homebrew with a patch for c++11 stuff, but it looks like paging and terrain are disabled by default. I tried enabling them and it fails to compile. Have you tried building extra components on that branch?
content.html: I've gotten v2-1 building on homebrew with a patch for c++11 stuff, but it looks like paging and terrain are disabled by default. I tried enabling them and it fails to compile. Have you tried building extra components on that branch?

content.raw:
I’m getting it from the head of v2-1 branch on bitbucket. 

[https://bitbucket.org/sinbad/ogre/src/f01971cb102e617ff3635ec9e89a6ff6498cc467/?at=v2-1](https://bitbucket.org/sinbad/ogre/src/f01971cb102e617ff3635ec9e89a6ff6498cc467/?at=v2-1)

I think OGRECave tries to be in sync with the version on bitbucket but main development happens on the bibucket repo
content.html:
I’m getting it from the head of v2-1 branch on bitbucket.

https://bitbucket.org/sinbad/ogre/src/f01971cb102e617ff3635ec9e89a6ff6498cc467/?at=v2-1
